name: Panopticon (KOTOB)
description:
Fight through bosses to defend your facility, by blowing up in their face!
Except there's only one boss.
And there's not really a facility yet
But we can pretend there is!

(I couldn't exactly meet the time limit for this jam, cuz i suck at game design, so I did what I could in the time I had left. I might update this after the jam ends- who knows?)
